Hi! This is Mel from Trala, and I'm eager to hear more about your violin journey so far. What inspired you to pick up the instrument and what have you done so far? Do you have a violin?
Great! I have scheduled our call for 3 PM tomorrow in your timezone. You will receive a calendar invite shortly at your email: uzair@hellogepeto.com.
Please let me know if you need to reschedule or if there are specific topics you'd like to cover during our call. Looking forward to speaking with you!
